import React, { useRef, useState } from "react"; import "../styles/tour-details.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours.js"; import tours from "../assets/data/tours.js"; import calculateAvgRating from "../utils/avgRating.js"; import { avatar } from "../assets/images"; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const reviewMsgRef= use const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id); const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize, } = tour; const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); // !:format Date const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" }; return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating}{" "} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not Rated" ) : ( {reviews?.length} )} {address}
{city} {price} / per person {distance} K/m {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/*//! =========== TOUR REVIEWS SECTION =========== */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1{" "} 2{" "} 3{" "} 4{" "} 5{" "}
{reviews?.map(review => (
muhib

{new Date("01-18-2023").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5{" "}
Amazing tour
))}
{/*//! =========== TOUR REVIEWS SECTION END =========== */}
); }; export default TourDetails;
